channel.title: Data Analysis on Home | Lucas Kohorst
channel.description: Recent content in Data Analysis on Home | Lucas Kohorst

item.title: Twitter Data Analysis
item.description: After creating the Free Wtr bot using Tweepy and Python and this code, I wanted a way to see how Twitter users were perceiving the bot and what their sentiment was. So I created a simple data analysis program that takes a given number of tweets, analyzes them, and displays the data in a scatter plot. Image credit. Setup I had to install a few packages to create this: Tweepy, Tkinter, Textblob and matplotlib.

item.title: Basic data analysis on Twitter with Python
item.description: After creating the Free Wtr bot using Tweepy and Python and this code, I wanted a way to see how Twitter users were perceiving the bot and what their sentiment was. So I created a simple data analysis program that takes a given number of tweets, analyzes them, and displays the data in a scatter plot. Image credit. Setup I had to install a few packages to create this: Tweepy, Tkinter, Textblob and matplotlib.
